translated: The Story of the Ghost at Pāṭaliputta
“Have you seen the hells, the animal realm,
The ghosts, the titans, or the human and divine?
You’ve seen the ripening of your own actions.
Go there and do good deeds.”
I’ve seen the hells, the animal realm,
The ghosts, the titans, and the human and divine.
I’ve seen the ripening of my own actions.
The eleventh story of the Petavatthu is finished.
